description: A tragic accident drives a wedge between two teenage boys, threatening a friendship that had seemed firm and unshakeable.
actors: Owen Campbell, Charlie Tahan, Elizabeth Cappuccino, Max Talisman

title: Super Monsters Save Halloween
description: The Super Monsters use their powers to get their neighbors in the Halloween spirit, then help a nervous friend see there's nothing to be afraid of.
actors: Elyse Maloway, Vincent Tong, Erin Matthews, Andrea Libman

title: Super Nani
description: A loving, concerned American grandson travels to Mumbai to rescue his unappreciated grandmother from her drudgery and fulfill her true potential.
actors: Rekha, Randhir Kapoor, Sharman Joshi, Anupam Kher

title: Superfast!
description: An undercover cop joins a gang of illegal street racers in concocting a crazy plan to double-cross a crime lord who hides his cash at a Taco Bell.
actors: Alex Ashbaugh, Dale Pavinski, Lili Mirojnick, Andrea Navedo

title: Supermassive Black Holes
description: "Horizon" examines the recent discovery of supermassive black holes, which spawn galaxies even as they threaten to destroy everything in their path.
actors: John Shrapnel

title: Superstar
description: A media storm follows a famous actor after he is wounded during a shooting scene in which fake bullets were replaced with real ones.
actors: Dhruvin Shah, Rashami Desai, Mithil Jain, Aarian Sawant

title: Survivor
description: Framed after a terrorist bombing, a U.S. embassy employee is on the run in London, while trying to stop another pending attack.
actors: Milla Jovovich, Pierce Brosnan, Dylan McDermott, Angela Bassett

title: Swades
description: An Americanized NASA scientist returns to his native India on a business trip and searches for the nanny who helped raise him.
actors: Shah Rukh Khan, Gayatri Joshi, Kishori Balal, Smith Seth

title: Swearnet Live
description: "Trailer Park Boys" John Paul Tremblay, Robb Wells and Mike Smith host this foulmouthed live kickoff of their web-based Swearnet network.
actors: Mike Smith, John Paul Tremblay, Robb Wells, John Dunsworth

title: Swearnet: The Movie
description: After losing a TV network deal, the Trailer Park Boys launch their own Internet series, but they soon confront personal and creative differences.
actors: Mike Smith, John Paul Tremblay, Robb Wells, Patrick Roach

title: Sweet Blackberry Presents: Garrett's Gift
description: A young boy's creative mind gets him into trouble, until he begins to apply that creativity to life-changing inventions, including the traffic signal.
actors: Queen Latifah

title: Sweet Blackberry Presents: Henry Box Brown
description: In a magical take on a true story, a slave mails himself from a plantation in Richmond, Virginia, to freedom in Philadelphia in 1848.
actors: Alfre Woodard

title: Sweet Home
description: Trespassing in a decrepit apartment building for a romantic interlude, a couple finds themselves trapped by masked killers on a sinister mission.
actors: Ingrid García Jonsson, Bruno Sevilla, Eduardo Lloveras, Oriol Tarrida Homedes

title: Swim Team
description: Three swimmers from the Jersey Hammerheads, a competitive team of teens on the spectrum, strive to rise above their disability in and out of the pool.

title: Swimming with Killer Whales
description: Dr. Ingrid Visser shares the water with killer whales, one of the world's most feared and misunderstood species, for clues to the state of our oceans.
actors: John Hannah

title: Sword Master
description: Haunted by the past, a master swordsman masks his identity to work anonymously as a janitor in a brothel, setting in motion a violent chain of events.
actors: Kenny Lin, Peter Ho, Jiang Mengjie, Jiang Yiyan

title: Sword Masters: Two Champions of Shaolin
description: Shaolin warrior Tung Chien-chen is injured in battle against the hated Wu Tang clan, and nursed back to health by a knife-throwing master.
actors: Meng Lo, Sheng Chiang, Li Wang, Siu-Ho Chin

title: Sylvanian Families: A Town of Dreams
description: Today is a very special day. One excited little girl is going into town to visit her big sister, who's designed a beautiful dress for a fashion show!

title: Sylvanian Families: The Treasure of Sylvania Village
description: Inspired by the children, the mayor puts on a competition at the fete to pick the loveliest thing in the village.

title: Synchronicity
description: A physicist tries to stop a mysterious woman from stealing his coveted invention by traveling back in time, where he uncovers surprising truths.
actors: Chad McKnight, Brianne Davis, AJ Bowen, Michael Ironside
